events.name: New Jersey Devils at Toronto Maple Leafs

headlines.description: — Jack Hughes scored the third hat trick of his NHL career as the New Jersey Devils topped the Toronto Maple Leafs 5-2 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jack Hughes' hat trick lifts Devils over Maple Leafs 5-2

headlines.description: — Jake Walman scored a power-play goal at 2:24 of overtime and the Edmonton Oilers snapped a three-game skid with a 3-2 win over the Ottawa Senators on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Walman scores in OT, Oilers beat Senators 3-2

events.name: San Jose Sharks at New York Islanders

headlines.description: — Matthew Schaefer had a goal and an assist, and the New York Islanders beat the winless San Jose Sharks 4-3 on Tuesday night to win their third straight after dropping their first three games of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Islanders beat Sharks 4-3 for third straight win

headlines.description: — Sidney Crosby scored his fourth goal and Kris Letang became the 20th defenseman in NHL history to reach 600 career assists as the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Vancouver Canucks 5-1 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Crosby scores, Letang reaches 600 career assists as Penguins breeze past Canucks 5-1

events.name: Columbus Blue Jackets at Dallas Stars

headlines.description: — Columbus captain Boone Jenner had a power-play goal and an assist in the first period, and the Blue Jackets beat Dallas 5-1 on Tuesday night to hand the slumping Stars their third straight defeat.
headlines.shortLinkText: Blue Jackets captain Boone Jenner nets goal and assist in 5-1 win over slumping Stars
